mapper.sql: id, product_id, user_id, quantity, selected, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select c.id as id, p.id as productId, c.user_id as userId, c.quantity as quantity, c.selected as selected, p.price as price, p.name as productName, p.image as productImage from mall_cart c left join mall_product p on p.id = c.product_id where c.user_id = #{userId} and p.status = 1
